TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CookieParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 將用戶端 HTTP Cookie 的值繫結至參數物件。

span.span: Binds the value of a client-side HTTP cookie to a parameter object.

summary.span: 此參數可用於參數化查詢或命令來選取、篩選或更新資料。

span.span: The parameter can be used in a parameterized query or command to select, filter, or update data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用繫結的用戶端 HTTP cookie 做為 HTTP 要求的一部分傳遞至 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項所使用的參數值的類別。You can use the class to bind the value of a client-side HTTP cookie passed as part of an HTTP request to a parameter used by ASP.NET data source controls. 類別會提供屬性，可識別的名稱要繫結，除了那些物件繼承自類別。The class provides the property, which identifies the name of the object to bind to, in addition to those inherited from the class. 類別會嘗試繫結至具名的 cookie 每次呼叫方法。The class attempts to bind to the named cookie every time the method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 將資料繫結至參數的控制項可能會擲回例外狀況，如果指定的物件，但沒有對應的 cookie 會使用 HTTP 要求來傳遞。Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a object is specified, but no corresponding cookie is passed with the HTTP request. 同樣地，它們可能會顯示沒有資料如果 cookie 會使用傳遞`null`。Similarly, they might display no data if the cookie is passed with `null`. 設定若要避免這些情況下，在適當的屬性。Set the property to avoid these situations where appropriate. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項和來顯示從 Northwind Traders 資料庫中的資料物件繫結至 HTTP cookie控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control and object bound to an HTTP cookie to display data from the Northwind Traders database in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/CS/cp1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/VB/cp1vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件以建立建構函式會以其所有屬性的預設值初始化。A object created with the constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties. 屬性會初始化為 。The property is initialized to . 此外，屬性會初始化為，則屬性會初始化為，則屬性會初始化為，和屬性會初始化若要`null`。Additionally, the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , and the property is initialized to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立物件使用建構函式，設定其， ，並屬性，然後將它新增到控制項的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to create a object using the constructor, set its , , and properties, and then add it to a control's collection. summary.span: 取得或設定參數繫結至的 HTTP Cookie 名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the HTTP cookie that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 字串，識別參數繫結至的用戶端 HTTP Cookie。

span.span: A string that identifies the client-side HTTP cookie that the parameter binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別 HTTP cookie，由表示物件，並可透過目前物件。The property identifies an HTTP cookie, which is represented by an object and is available through the current object. 如果 HTTP cookie 不在目前物件，方法來繫結參數的值屬性，如果已設定。If the HTTP cookie is not available in the current object, the method binds the parameter to the value of the property, if it is set. 如果未設定屬性，方法時，無法將參數繫結的值。If the property is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式使用控制項和來顯示從 Northwind Traders 資料庫中的資料物件繫結至 HTTP cookie控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively use a control and a object bound to an HTTP cookie to display data from the Northwind Traders database in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/CS/cp1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/VB/cp1vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式建立物件、 設定其屬性，並將它加入控制項的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a object, set its properties, and add it to a control's collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2/CS/cookieparam2cs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2/VB/cookieparam2vb.aspx.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context`參數由方法來擷取的 cookie 集合和 cookie 的值，物件繫結至。The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the cookies collection and the value of the cookie that the object binds to. `control`參數會被忽略。The `control` parameter is ignored.
